returns.prices: Array of prices in USD with 18 decimals

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.price: Price in USD (18 decimals), 0 to clear

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

MAX_STALENESS().notice: Maximum staleness for Chainlink prices (1 hour)

getPrice(address).notice: Get the USD price of a token (18 decimals)

hasFeed(address).notice: Check if a price feed exists for a token

setChainlinkFeed(address,address).notice: Set Chainlink price feed for a token

setChainlinkFeeds(address[],address[]).notice: Set multiple Chainlink feeds at once

setUniswapPool(address,address).notice: Set Uniswap pool for TWAP fallback

uniswapPools(address).notice: Uniswap V3 pool for TWAP fallback
